__e: This Kofu Castle... might be burnt to the ground tomorrow.
It was the Castle of Fyrien, I'm sure of it.
I hear you know this castle of old.
This place is not just our home.
Your general is dead and your castle has fallen.
What a privilege to gather them all in a castle they can call their own.
That's not enough to defend the entire perimeter.
When I grow up, I want enough money to build a real castle.
If they keep going to the west, in a day or so they'll come to the fortress at Werham.
It's our castle in a world of demons and dragons.
Otherwise, they'd be safe within the walls of this castle, and the book would be here with me now.
And then they came to this castle and this view.
Our home is our castle, and we shall defend it, down to the last man, woman and child.
You have a heart as big as that castle, and I love you for it.
